tool_description: An API that provides daily values of American stock prices, along with their maximum and minimum values within the day, as well as the values from the previous day.
name: American Stock Market API
title: American Stock Market API

api_list.name: american-stocks/exchange-rate
api_list.description: The code information is obtained from the endpoint address mentioned above. If no value is provided, it lists all of them. You can specify multiple values by separating them with commas.

api_list.name: american-stocks/list
api_list.description: The endpoint address used to list all supported stocks. You can obtain the stock codes from here.
